entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is introduced as a house-elf who has been helping Harry Potter and Kreacher.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is introduced as a house-elf who is working with Dobby to tail Malfoy.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the person that Dobby and Kreacher are helping.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a character who is shocked by the sudden appearances of Dobby and Kreacher.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as the person that Dobby and Kreacher are tasked with tailing.

relationships.description: Dobby and Kreacher are working together to make reports.
Kreacher and Dobby are working together to make reports.
Dobby and Kreacher have been tasked with tailing Malfoy on behalf of Harry Potter.
